title: Laning against Jhin is a joy and a pleasure.
body: Balanced base damage.  Has more utility than any adc in the game, bursts harder than most too.

replies.body: The amount of you who are indignant at this thread, and couldn't pick up on the obvious sarcasm.... wow.  Just wow.
You were sarcastic except your sarcasm was correct and your actual point wasn't.

Umm, i have highest winrate of all vs jhins :D 22 games 19 wins vs jhin, 0 wins with a jhin in team. Humm. He is overrated, usually ive seen only high diamonds and low bronzes - silver 5 is a bronze too, complain about him
Your personal experience =/= reality. Reality is Jhin has a 55% playrate and 52% win rate. Thankfully Rito is nerfing him as is justified.

Platinum+ he is 7th best adc with only 49%, but if people wouldnt read retarded guides from NA players, they would take actual top anti jhin champions like kalista, vayne, tristana, sivir, which all have a lot better powerspike lategame, and have very huge potential to put him behind early. Also supports like velkoz, morgana, zyra, braum rend his useless slow attack speed to even more useless.

Let's follow the "Jhin is perfect because I like him" circlejerk to the ends of the universe.

Glad Riot balances the game and not the boards, thank god for nerfs to a champion with 55% playrate and yet still somehow maintains 52% win rate.
Depends, Jhin before Lethality buffs sure, after lethality buffs not so much
didnt they say in a recent article that he has the least dmg early game?
no, kalista's either takes time to ramp her utility up (multiple stacks on an obj/champ)  or u have to depend on the other persons wishes( her ult)
